fields.Name: Casa Familia
fields.Capacity / Layout: ~45 beds: 20 for women; 2 respite; 5 family rooms (up to 5 each)
fields.Entry / Referral Process: Call to join waitlist; intake required; 24 hours to respond if contacted
fields.Entry Criteria: Breathalyzer + drug test (dirty UA okay if trending down); Emotional support animals allowed (if safe)
fields.Services & Amenities: Food (staples, shared kitchen); Laundry; Case management + therapy; Van transport M–F 9–2; Services for non-guests (food, clothing)
fields.Notes: Length of stay variable, set by staff

fields.Name: Esperanza
fields.Capacity / Layout: 30 beds (9 bedrooms ~4 beds each; some singles)
fields.Population served: Survivors of domestic violence; high-lethality cases
fields.Entry / Referral Process: Hotline only; beds can be held for 24 hours
fields.Entry Criteria: Service animals only (vaccines required); no detoxing, drugs, alcohol, or paraphernalia
fields.Services & Amenities: Food (dry goods/snacks, shared kitchen); ADA-accessible bathrooms/showers; Laundry; Onsite: clinical services, legal advocacy, case management; No services for non-guests
fields.Notes: 90-day max stay; No curfew; No case management requirement

fields.Name: Arroyo Chamiso
fields.Population served: Adults experiencing street homelessness; no children
fields.Entry / Referral Process: Referrals only through street outreach; not advertised publicly; shelters cannot refer
fields.Entry Criteria: No sobriety requirement; sex offenders allowed; must engage with case worker & pursue housing goal
fields.Services & Amenities: Pets allowed (max 2 per unit); Detached restroom & hygiene units; 2 meals/day for residents; No services for non-residents; Not ADA accessible; No bus line (outreach team transports)

fields.Name: Men’s Shelter
fields.Entry Criteria: High-barrier (alcohol/drug test required; no detox); Sex offenders accepted; ESAs w/ documentation
fields.Services & Amenities: 2 meals/day; Showers & laundry for guests; Case management + therapy; Inreach program (food, clothing, hygiene, mail)
fields.Notes: Must leave 9am–2pm daily; Length of stay depends on progress toward goals

fields.Name: Agape
fields.Capacity / Layout: 85 beds total, including 5 medical (3 women, 2 men)
fields.Entry / Referral Process: Low-barrier; no set length of stay; 24/7 access
fields.Entry Criteria: Pets allowed (non-violent, muzzles if required); drug-free zone; sobriety not required; only exit violent guests
fields.Services & Amenities: 3 meals/day; Oasis serves ~100 meals/day to non-guests; Laundry; Transportation provided; Weekly case management/care coordination

fields.Name: Consuelo’s Place
fields.Capacity / Layout: 60 rooms (30 singles/adult couples; 30 family suites); Expansion: 10+ congregate overflow
fields.Population served: Individuals, couples, families; Priority: 55+, LGBTQ+, Veterans, Medical Respite
fields.Entry / Referral Process: Referrals 1st–5th of each month; must be engaged in case management toward housing goal
fields.Entry Criteria: No sex offenders; not detoxing; service dogs allowed; sobriety not required
fields.Services & Amenities: Food (YW dinners, supplies for girls); Shared showers for guests; Case management required; No services for non-guests; No bus line access
